Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 131st/Evans
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Ellis and 131st due to street blockage near 131st/Evans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Ellis and 131st due to street blockage near 131st/Evans.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Washington. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Washington.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
